vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἔνοχος, ον,
={ἐνεχόμενος}, held in, bound by, τοιαύταις δόξαις [Refs 4th c.BC+]; [ἔθεσι γεροντικοῖς] [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 with genitive, connected with, κοιλίης [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II as law-term, liable to, subject to, νόμοις, δίκαις, [NT+5th c.BC+]; τοῖς ἐπιτιμίοις τοῦ φόνου [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἔ. ἀνοίαις liable to the imputation of it, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.2 ἔνοχος ψευδομαρτυρίοις liable to action for.., [Refs 5th c.BC+]; βιαίων, λιποταξίου (i.e. δίκῃ, γραφῇ), [LXX+5th c.BC+]; ἔ. θανάτου liable to the penalty of death, [NT+1st c.BC+]: with infinitive, ἔ. ἔστω ἀποτῖσαι [Refs]
__II.3 less frequently with Preps., ἔ. ἐν τοῖς αὐτοῖς Decrees cited in [Refs 6th c.BC+]
__II.4 guilty, liable to the penalty for, ἔ. τῷ φόνῳ [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.4.b of property, subject to liability, [Refs 6th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
subject to; guilty, liable for
held in, or by; subjected to, Heb. 2:15; subject to, liable to, guilty, deserving, Mt. 5:21, 22; 26:66; Mk. 3:29; 14:64; an offender against, 1Cor. 11:27; Jas. 2:10*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: responsable, culpable ; meritorio (de muerte) ; culpable de pecar contra (1CO.11:27) ; esclavizado (HEB.2:15)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 受制於 (來 2:15)
2) 有責任的, 有罪的, 要交待的
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 受制于 (来 2:15)
2) 有责任的, 有罪的, 要交待的
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đáng; xứng đáng; đáng tội; mắc tội. Xem G1758
